message: Accept this fair offer and we can end the game quickly!
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
Meet me in the middle, Bob! This is a fair compromise.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. Don't expect me to go any further!
You're getting close to desperation, but I'm not showing mercy yet!
This is my final offer. I'm not going any lower. Take it or leave it!
